about_the_game:
A Fallen Friendship, a Stolen Love—

To rescue his beloved, taken by a trusted friend, a vengeful shadow pierces the darkness in a high-speed, exhilarating running action game.

Cut Through Enemy Lines with "Gale Rush" !

Experience the ultimate thrill with simple controls: just lock on and strike! Become a whirlwind, wielding lightning-fast sword techniques to carve through layers of fearsome foes.

[img][/img]

Time is Running Out!

When the moon sinks and the sun rises, the forbidden ritual "Akegarasu" will make it all too late. With only one minute until dawn, every slash with the secret technique "Chronomancy" extends the night. Fight against the clock until the very last second!

[img][/img]

Dynamic Actions to Overcome Obstacles!

Unleash a wide array of high-speed, heroic moves straight from the pages of manga and anime. Leap over enemies and obstacles with flair, racing toward victory.

[img][/img]

Run Until the Final Moment!
